participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, always ready to share a laugh.
participant_1.background: i've a german shepherd named barnaby. i am employed by the us postal service. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, always looking for the silver lining.
participant_2.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

content.text: I love green, reminds me of summer.
